name: Blue Ribbon Chocolate Chip Cookies
author: Ruth Schlosser
instructions: Mix in large bowl, first 5 ingredients with electric mixer until creamy. Add salt, baking soda and flour, mixing well. Add chocolate chips and nuts. Drop by VERY OVERLOADED teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake in 350Â° oven for 12 minutes. Cool on aluminum foil. Other varieties of chips can be used as desire.
